rules.rationale: CARDIA echocardiography tables: C1ECHO (75 vars, Exam 3/Year 5), E1ECHY05 (114 vars, Exam 6/Year 15 echo at Y5), E1ECHY10 (114 vars, Exam 6/Year 15 echo at Y10). Variables include LVMASS, A2SLVEDV, A2SLVEF (C1ECHO) and EIVSTD, EDVTI, EAHR (E1ECHY*). All are cardiac ultrasound measurements. No non-echo tables contain 'ECHO' or 'ECHY' in their names.

CARDIA pulmonary function tables: E1F12PF (125 vars), B2F12PF (94 vars), C1F12PF (90 vars), E1F12PF8 (21 vars). 'F12' = Form 12, 'PF' = Pulmonary Function. Variables include FEV1 (E12FEV11-E12FEV18), FE time (E12FE1TM). Note: B2F12/E1F12/F1F12 (without 'PF' suffix) are respiratory symptom questionnaires with SOB/COLD variables â€” correctly excluded.

D1DEXA (63 vars, Exam 4/Year 7). Variables include DDXHPBMC/DDXHPTOT (hip BMC/total), DDXL2BMD-DDXL4BMD (lumbar spine BMD), DDXNBMC/DDXNBMD (neck), DDXLLFAT/DDXLLLN (leg composition). All from one DXA scanner session.

EBCT = Electron Beam CT for coronary artery calcium scoring. F2EBCT (167 vars, Exam 8/Year 25) and E1EBCT (30 vars, Exam 6/Year 15). Variables include FR3ADJSC (adjusted score), FR3TSCOR (total score), FR3MAREA (area), ER2TSCOR/ER2AFOCI (foci count). Same instrument type as MESA vascular-ct-imaging.

C1CARTDA (38 vars, Exam 3/Year 5). 'CARTD' = Carotid, 'A' = dataset A. Variables include bilateral carotid measurements: C1LBDEP/C1RBDEP (left/right bulb depth), C1LCADEP/C1RCADEP (left/right common artery depth), C1DISTEN (distensibility). All from carotid ultrasound.
